def_en: If you say that you will do your damnedest to achieve something, you mean that you will try as hard as you can to do it, even though you think that it will take a lot of effort.

def_cn: 令人万分惊奇的;极为古怪的
def_en: If you say that something is the damnedest thing, you are emphasizing that it is surprising or odd.
